tgt_original: prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthaistaiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet |  gocarmamātrabhū lipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet ||201 ||
ācamya tricalupānaṃ dattvā bāhye niveśya ca |  kuśān śayyopadhānāya bāhuḥ(huṃ)
sūtraiḥ surakṣayet ||202 ||  tricalupānamantraḥ-om hrīḥ viśuddhadharma sarvapāpāni cāsya śodhaya sarvavikalpānapanaya hū |
sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā |
tatsarvaṃ hi kṣayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā maṇḍalamīdṛśam ||205 ||
kimutānantayaśasāṃ mantracaryānaye sthitaḥ |  padaṃ hyanuttaraṃ yāti japanvai mantra(ntraṃ) tāyinām ||206 ||
ucchinnā durgati steṣāṃ sarvaduḥkhasya sambhavā |  yeṣāṃ caryāvare hyasminmatiratyantanirmalā ||207 ||
yena yūyaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ saputrairiha śāsane ||208 ||  sarve parigṛhītāḥ stha jāyamānā mahātmabhiḥ |
tattvena siddha me bhagavan mahārāgo mahārata ||284 ||
tena satyena me nātha kāmāṃstvaṃ paripūraya ||288 ||
ayaṃ vaḥ satataṃ rakṣaḥ(kṣyaḥ)  siddhaḥ samayasaṃvaraḥ |
bodhicittaṃ na vai tyājyaṃ yadvajramiti mudrayā |
saddharmo na pratikṣepyo na ca tyājyaḥ kadācana |
ajñānādvātha mohādvā na vai vivṛṇuyāt sa tu ||386 ||
vajraṃ ghaṇṭā ca mudrā ca na vai tyājyā kadācana |
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena vajrācāryaṃ mahāgurum |  pracchannavarakalyāṇaṃ nāvamanyet kadācana ||391 ||
anurūpaṃ ca te deyaṃ gurubhaktaṃ sadakṣiṇam |
tato jvarādayastāpā na bhūyaḥ prabhavanti hi ||392 ||
nityaṃ ca gurave deyaṃ sarvabuddhasamo hyasau ||393 ||
tad dānāt puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ sambhārādbodhiruttamā |  datte'smai sarvabuddhebhyo dattaṃ bhavati śāśvatam ||394 ||
adya vaḥ saphalaṃ janma yadasmin supratiṣṭhitāḥ |
adya mārān vinirjitya praviṣṭāḥ paramaṃ puram |
